DataElement.preferredName: Patient Strong CYP3A CYP2C8 Induction Inhibition Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Last Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date related to the last administration of CYP2C8/CYP3A inhibitors for clinical trial eligibility determination.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Strong CYP3A CYP2C8 Induction Inhibition Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Having strength, power, or intensity greater than average or expected._Human CYP3A gene locus is located within 7q21.3-q22.1 and is approximately 218 kb in length. This locus includes four protein-encoding genes, CYP3A4, CYP3A5, CYP3A7 and CYP3A43, and two pseudogenes, CYP3A5P1 and CYP3A5P2. The protein-encoding genes are involved in drug metabolism and the biosynthesis of cholesterol, steroids and other lipids._This gene plays a role in drug metabolism. It is also involved in the oxidation of both endobiotics and xenobiotics._The act of bringing about something._The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Strong CYP3A Gene Locus CYP2C8 Gene Induction Inhibition Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Having strength, power, or intensity greater than average or expected.:Human CYP3A gene locus is located within 7q21.3-q22.1 and is approximately 218 kb in length. This locus includes four protein-encoding genes, CYP3A4, CYP3A5, CYP3A7 and CYP3A43, and two pseudogenes, CYP3A5P1 and CYP3A5P2. The protein-encoding genes are involved in drug metabolism and the biosynthesis of cholesterol, steroids and other lipids.:This gene plays a role in drug metabolism. It is also involved in the oxidation of both endobiotics and xenobiotics.:The act of bringing about something.:The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Having strength, power, or intensity greater than average or expected.

Human CYP3A gene locus is located within 7q21.3-q22.1 and is approximately 218 kb in length. This locus includes four protein-encoding genes, CYP3A4, CYP3A5, CYP3A7 and CYP3A43, and two pseudogenes, CYP3A5P1 and CYP3A5P2. The protein-encoding genes are involved in drug metabolism and the biosynthesis of cholesterol, steroids and other lipids.
This gene plays a role in drug metabolism. It is also involved in the oxidation of both endobiotics and xenobiotics.
The act of bringing about something.
The interference with or prevention of an action or response even though the stimulus for that action or response is present.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the last date of an evaluation, assessment, or treatment.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
